author: Christopher Brito
title: 21 NYC teachers have died of coronavirus, DOE says
description: The NYC Department of Education says 50 employees, including 21 teachers, have died due to the virus.
content:
The New York City Department of Education (DOE) said Monday that 50 of its employees, including 21 teachers, have died from coronavirus. The deaths were reported by the deceased's families and loved ones, DOE said.  
The DOE said they died between March 16 a… [+2306 chars]
